text: John Guiher Hutchinson (February 4, 1935 - May 31, 2024) was an American politician. He was born in Charleston, West Virginia. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Hutchinson was a member of the United States House of Representatives from West Virginia's 3rd congressional district from 1980 until 1981. He was also Mayor of Charleston from 1971 until 1980.
